name: Admiration
description: A feeling of respect and warm approval.

name: Adoration
description: Deep love and respect.

name: Aesthetic Appreciation
description: The appreciation of beauty.

name: Amusement
description: The feeling of finding something funny.

name: Anger
description: A strong feeling of annoyance, displeasure, or hostility.

name: Anxiety
description: A feeling of worry, nervousness, or unease.

name: Awe
description: A feeling of reverential respect mixed with fear or wonder.

name: Awkwardness
description: The feeling of being embarrassed or socially inept.

name: Boredom
description: The state of feeling uninterested in one's surroundings or activities.

name: Calmness
description: The state of being free from agitation or excitement.

name: Concentration
description: The action or power of focusing one's attention or mental effort.

name: Confusion
description: Lack of understanding; uncertainty.

name: Contemplation
description: The action of looking thoughtfully at something for a long time.

name: Contempt
description: The feeling that a person or a thing is beneath consideration, worthless, or deserving scorn.

name: Contentment
description: A state of happiness and satisfaction.

name: Craving
description: A powerful desire for something.

name: Desire
description: A strong feeling of wanting to have something or wishing for something to happen.

name: Determination
description: The quality of being firmly resolved to do something.

name: Disappointment
description: Sadness or displeasure caused by the non-fulfillment of one's hopes or expectations.

name: Disgust
description: A feeling of revulsion or strong disapproval aroused by something unpleasant or offensive.

name: Distress
description: Extreme anxiety, sorrow, or pain.

name: Doubt
description: A feeling of uncertainty or lack of conviction.

name: Ecstasy
description: An overwhelming feeling of great happiness or joyful excitement.

name: Embarrassment
description: A feeling of self-consciousness, shame, or awkwardness.

name: Empathic Pain
description: Feeling another person's pain as if it were one's own.

name: Entrancement
description: A state of being filled with wonder and delight, holding their entire attention.

name: Envy
description: A feeling of discontented or resentful longing aroused by someone else's possessions, qualities, or luck.

name: Excitement
description: A feeling of great enthusiasm and eagerness.

name: Fear
description: An unpleasant emotion caused by the belief that someone or something is dangerous, likely to cause pain, or a threat.

name: Guilt
description: A feeling of having done wrong or failed in an obligation.

name: Horror
description: An intense feeling of fear, shock, or disgust.

name: Interest
description: The feeling of wanting to know or learn about something or someone.

name: Joy
description: A feeling of great pleasure and happiness.

name: Love
description: An intense feeling of deep affection.

name: Nostalgia
description: A sentimental longing or wistful affection for a period in the past.

name: Pain
description: Highly unpleasant physical sensation caused by illness or injury.

name: Pride
description: A feeling of deep pleasure or satisfaction derived from one's own achievements.

name: Realization
description: An act of becoming fully aware of something as a fact.

name: Relief
description: A feeling of reassurance and relaxation following release from anxiety or distress.

name: Romance
description: A quality or feeling of mystery, excitement, and remoteness from everyday life.

name: Sadness
description: The condition or quality of being sad.

name: Satisfaction
description: Fulfillment of one's wishes, expectations, or needs, or the pleasure derived from this.

name: Shame
description: A painful feeling of humiliation or distress caused by the consciousness of wrong or foolish behavior.

name: Surprise (negative)
description: A feeling of mild astonishment or shock, in an unpleasant way.

name: Surprise (positive)
description: A feeling of mild astonishment or shock, in a pleasant way.

name: Sympathy
description: Feelings of pity and sorrow for someone else's misfortune.

name: Tiredness
description: The state of wishing for sleep or rest; weariness.

name: Triumph
description: A great victory or achievement.
